manipulated_prompt_obj.inputs:
<image>
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer

raw_response_obj.response:
DESCRIPTION: A long, well-lit hallway with a checkered floor pattern of beige and brown tiles. The walls are light-colored with wooden door frames, and there are several closed doors on both sides. Fluorescent lights are evenly spaced on the ceiling, and there is an exit sign visible at the end of the hallway.

ANSWER: The hallway is straight and leads directly to the exit sign at the end. The doors are on both sides of the hallway.
